title: Biome
description: Biome from ENVO (child of ENVO:00000428)

title: City/Township
description: City or Township where the sample was collected

title: Collection time
description: Date amd time when the sample was collected in ISO 8601 format

title: Comment
description: Free form Comment

title: Continent
description: Continent

title: Country
description: Country

title: County
description: County

title: Depth
description: depth in meters below ground surface (m BGS)

title: Description
description: Free text to describe features of a sample such as its components, texture, color, shape, etc.
examples: dredge with 50 pieces of basalt and mud

title: Elevation
description: Elevation at which a sample was collected. Use negative values for depth below sea level. Minimum elevation if a range is provided for the elevation/depth below sea level.

title: Elevation End
description: End elevation at which a sample was collected. Use negative values for depth below sea level. Minimum elevation if a range is provided for the elevation/depth below sea level.

title: AODC
description: units in cells per gram

title: Aquifer
description: Aquifer

title: Area Name
description: Area Name

title: Average Water Level
description: units in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Biomass Carbon
description: units in milligrams per gram

title: BONCAT Activity
description: units in cells per gram

title: Boring depth
description: boring depth in ft below groud surface (ft BGS)

title: Boring Diameter
description: boring diameter in inches

title: Boring Refusal
description: Boring Refusal (Y/N)

title: Collection time
description: Collection Time

title: Condition
description: Condition

title: Conductivity
description: conductivity in millisiemens per centimeter

title: DAPI Cell Count
description: DAPI cell count in cells per gram

title: Date
description: Date (YYYY-MM-DD)

title: DNA Picogreen Total
description: units in nanograms

title: Drive Casing End Depth
description: drive casing end depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Drive Casing ID
description: drive casing inner diameter in inches

title: Drive Casing OD
description: drive casing outer diameter in inches

title: Drive Casing Start Depth
description: units in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Drive Casing Type
description: Drive Casing Type

title: Experiment Name
description: Experiment Name

title: Filter
description: Filter pore size in microns

title: Fraction
description: Fraction

title: Fractures/Cavities/WaterBreaks
description: Fractures/Cavities/WaterBreaks

title: Functional Area
description: Functional Area

title: Geological Zone
description: Geological Zone

title: Ground Elevation
description: ground elevation in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Installation Method
description: Method of installation

title: Leucine Activity (ngC/day cell)
description: units in ngC/day cell

title: Lower Seal End Depth
description: Lower seal end depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Lower Seal Start Depth
description: Lower seal start depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Lower Seal Type
description: Lower Seal Type (BENT; BENT-PEL)

title: Maturation Time
description: Maturation Time

title: Max Water Level
description: Maximum water level in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Method
description: Method

title: Min Water Level
description: Minimum water level in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Moisture
description: percent moisture

title: Open
description: Open (yes/no)

title: Open Casing Depth
description: Open casing depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Open Casing ID
description: open casing inner diameter in inches (in)

title: Open Casing OD
description: open casing outer diameter in inches (in)

title: Open Casing Type
description: Open Casing Type (SF25; STL)

title: Open Hole Depth
description: Open hole depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Open Hole Diameter
description: Open hole diameter in inches

title: Open Interval Diameter
description: Open interval diameter in inches

title: Open Interval End Depth
description: Open interval end depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Open Interval Start Depth
description: Open interval start depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Organic Carbon
description: Organic carbon in milligrams per gram dry weight

title: Origination or Plug/Abandon
description: Origination or Plug/Abandon (Date)

title: Packing Depth End
description: Packind depth end in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Packing Depth Start
description: Packind depth start in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Packing Type
description: Packing Type (e.g. SAND; SAND-2)

title: Pore Water Extraction
description: Pore water extraction in microliters

title: Recovery Factor
description: Recovery Factor

title: Redox Potential
description: Redox Potential

title: Rock Formation
description: Rock Formation

title: Screen Bottom Elevation
description: Screen bottom elevation in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Screen End Depth
description: Screen end depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Screen Start Depth
description: Screen start depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Screen Top Elevation
description: Screen top elevation in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Screen Type
description: Screen Type

title: Screened
description: Screened (yes/no)

title: Screened Interval
description: Screened interval in ft

title: Time Zone
description: Time Zone (relative to UTC)

title: Top of Casing Elevation
description: Top of casing elevation in ft above mean sea level (ft AMSL)

title: Top of Casing Stickup
description: Top of casing stickup in ft

title: Top of Fresh Bedrock
description: Top of fresh bedrock in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Top of Weathered Bedrock
description: Top of weathered bedrock in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Total Carbon
description: Total carbon in milligrams per gram dry weight

title: Total Nitrogen
description: Total nitrogen in milligrams per gram dry weight

title: Treatment
description: Treatment

description: Upper seal end depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Upper Seal Start Depth
description: Upper seal start depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Upper Seal Type
description: Upper Seal Type

title: Well Casing Depth
description: Well casing depth in ft below ground surface (ft BGS)

title: Well Casing ID
description: Well casing inner diameter. units in inches

title: Well Casing OD
description: Well casing outer diameter. units in inches

title: Well Casing Type
description: Well Casing Type

title: Well Name
description: Well Name (ID)

title: Well Status
description: Status of Well

title: Type of Well
description: Type of Welll (SP; MP)

title: Environmental Package
description: Environmental Package (MIxS vocabulary)

title: Feature
description: Feature from ENVO (child of ENVO:01000813)

title: Ecosystem Type
description: GOLD biosample identifier

title: Community
description: Community Sampled

title: Ecosystem (GOLD)
description: Ecosystem (GOLD)

title: Ecosystem Category
description: Ecosystem Category (GOLD)

title: Ecosystem Path ID
description: Ecosystem Path ID (GOLD)

title: Ecosystem Subtype
description: Ecosystem Subtype (GOLD)

title: Ecosystem Type
description: Ecosystem Type (GOLD)

title: Habitat
description: Sample Habitat (MIGS-6)

title: Specific Ecosystem Term
description: Specific Ecosystem (GOLD)

title: GOLD study identifier
description: GOLD study identifier

title: Latitude
description: Latitude of the location where the sample was collected in WGS 84 coordinate system. ('Start latitude' for linear sampling features such as dredges.) Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for South latitudes.

title: Latitude End
description: End latitude of the location where the sample was collected in WGS 84 coordinate system. ('End latitude' for linear sampling features such as dredges.) Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for South latitudes.

title: Locality
description: Name of the specific place where your sample was collected. This could be the name of a mine, a volcanic field, a vent field, or similar
examples: Craters of the Moon National Park

title: Locality description
description: Additional information about the specific place where your sample was collected

title: Location description
description: Free text description of the location

title: Longitude
description: Longitude of the location where the sample was collected in WGS 84 cooridinate system. ('Start longitude' for linear sampling features such as dredges.) Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for 'West' longitudes.

title: Longitude End
description: End longitude of the location where the sample was collected in WGS 84 cooridinate system. Needs to be entered in decimal degrees. Negative values for 'West' longitudes.

title: Material
description: Material from ENVO (child of ENVO:00010483)

title: Modification Date
description: Modification date

title: Sample Name
description: name validator

title: NCBI taxonomy name
description: NCBI Taxonomy Name

title: NMDC OMICS type
description: NMDC OMICS Type

title: Other name(s)
description: Other name(s) used for the sample.

title: pH
description: pH of sample

title: Purpose
description: Purpose of the Sample

title: Template
description: Template Format

title: Age (max)
description: Maximum geological age in years

title: Age (min)
description: minimum geological age in years

title: Age Unit
description: Unit for the age provided

title: Current archive contact
description: Address and/or email of the person who should be contacted for information about or access to the sample.

title: Original archive contact
description: Address and/or email of the person who should be contacted for information about the sample's original archive.

title: Current archive
description: Name of institution, museum, or repository where the sample is currently stored.

title: Original archive
description: Name of institution, museum, or repository where the sample is originally stored.

title: Classification
description: Taxonomy (formal classification) Formal categorization of sample.

title: Classification Comment
description: Classification Comment

title: Collection date
description: Date when the sample was collected.

title: Collection date (end)
description: Date when the sample collection was finished (if a date range is provided).

title: Collection date precision
description: Precision to display the collection date and time.

title: Collection method
description: Method by which a sample was collected

title: Collection method description
description: Additional information about the collection method
examples: Hand sample collected from the top part of a large boulder

title: Collection time
description: Time when the sample was collected.

title: Collection time (end)
description: End time when the sample was collected.

title: Collector/Chief Scientist name
description: Name of the person who collected the sample. In case of larger field programs, name of chief scientist responsible for sample collection.

title: Collector/Chief Scientist address
description: Institution, address, & email of the collector or chief scientist.
examples: Woods Hole Oceanographic Institution, Woods Hole, MA

title: Depth in Core (max)
description: maximum depth in core in meters

title: Depth in Core (min)
description: Minimum depth in core in meters

title: Depth scale
description: Unit in which the depth is provided

title: Easting
description: Easting in meters

title: Elevation end
description: Elevation end in meters

title: Elevation start
description: Elevation start in meters

title: Elevation Unit
description: Unit in which elevation start and/or end are provided in.

title: Field name (informal classification)
description: Taxonomy (field name) Informal classification of sample.

title: Field program/cruise
description: Name or identifier of the field program (cruise or expedition), during which the sample was collected.

title: Geological Age
description: Age of a sample as described by the stratigraphic era, period, state, etc.

title: Geological Unit
description: A body of rock established as a distinct entity in the classification of the Earth's rocks, e.g. Supergroup, Group, Formation, or Flow

title: IGSN
description: IGSN assigned by SESAR

title: Is Archived
description: Is Archived

title: Launch ID
description: Further identifying information about the launch

title: Launch platform name
description: The name of the launch used to collect the sample.

title: Launch type
description: The type of launch used to collect the sample.

title: Material (SESAR)
description: Material that the sample consists of using SESAR vocabulary.

title: Navigation type
description: Navigation type

title: Northing
description: Northing in meters

title: Parent IGSN
description: IGSN of Parent Sample

title: Name of physiographic feature
description: Name of the physiographic feature that you entered

title: Primary physiographic feature
description: Type of physical feature that your sample was collected from (see suggested list)

title: Platform description
description: Description of platform for the cruise.

title: Platform name
description: Name of platform for the cruise.

title: Platform type
description: Type of platform for the cruise.

title: Current Registrant Name
description: Registrant of the sample in SESAR

title: Organization Registrant Name
description: Registrant organization of the sample in SESAR

title: Related Identifiers
description: IGSN of Related Samples

title: Related URL
description: Related URL associated with the samples

title: Related URL Description
description: Free text description of the related URL

title: Related URL Type
description: Related URL type. Either DOI or Regular URL

title: Relation Type
description: Relation Type

title: Release date
description: Date when sample metadata is publicly accessible and searchable. If null, defaults to date of registration (recommended).

title: Sample Type
description: Sample Type

title: Size
description: Size of the registered object, such as the dimension of a specimen, the length of a core, or the weight of a dredge

title: Size unit
description: Unit for the numerical value provided for 'size'.

title: State/Province
description: State or Province where the sample was collected

title: Sub-object type
description: More descriptive Object Type. This applies only to samples with Object Type set to Individual Sample.

title: Vertical Datum
description: Vertical datum used to calculate the elevation

title: Zone
description: Zone for the geographic Cartesian coordinate "11R"

title: Size
description: Size in meters cubed

title: State/Province
description: State or Province

title: Study DOI
description: Study DOI

title: Study Principal Investigator
description: Study Principal Investigator

title: Temperature
description: Temperature (Celsius)

title: URL
description: URL for Sample
